name: Zhen Ming Jack Jiang
content: Zhen Ming (Jack) Jiang Associate Professor York Research Chair in Software Engineering for Foundation Model-Powered Systems Address: Department of Electrical Engineering & Computer Science York University Toronto, Ontario, Canada M3J 1P3 Office: LAS 1012E Phone: 416-650-8175 or 416-736-2100 x58175 Email: zmjiang at cse dot yorku dot ca I am recuiting talented graduate students! Please contact me if you have: Passion for research and innovation Excellent programming and analytical skills Good knowledge of English Please check here for graduate school applications in Electrical Engineering & Computer Science. Research Interests My research lies within Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Systems. In particular, I seek to address the following research questions: How do we bring engineering rigor into the development and maintenance of AI-powered applications? What should the software engineering process look like in the era of Generative AI? Can we improve the performance and efficiency of large-scale software systems? You can check out my publications to know more about my research. News Shonan seminar on "Foundation Models and Software Engineering: Challenges and Opportunities". March. 24- 28, 2024. Japan. Awards NSERC Discovery Accelerator Supplements (DAS), 2020 Best Paper Award at ICST 2016 IEEE Software Best SEIP Paper at ICSE 2015 Ph.D. Research Achievement Award at Queen's University Best Paper Award at WCRE 2011 Nominated for the Best Paper Award at ICSM 2013 ACM SIGSOFT Distinguished Paper Award at ICSE 2013 Best Paper Award at WCRE 2011 Best Challenge Paper Award at MSR 2009
